Just a reminder: Yahoo Groups is going to be down later tonight 
through sometime Sunday.

Discussion will pick up with proposed new character classes - not     
promotions or hybrids/dual class - each proposed new character gets 3 
days before I move on unless discussion picks up. I know of at least 
one new proposed character class for this category (Alchemist).

Topics for the weeks following that are as follows:

1)orc captains

2)more proposed new character class - promotions of existing classes  
only - each proposed new character gets 3 days before I move on unless 
 discussion picks up. I know of at least 3 proposed new promoted   
character classes for this category (high priest, asassin, practical  
mage).

3)Game Issues of Health, Potions of Magic, and Mana - yep, we will be 
talking about health and mana of characters for a week. Somehow, it   
will be tied to Hybrid/dual class discussion.

4)3 weeks on hybrid/dual class - we'll just have to wait and see why I 
 want to handle this in 3 parts.

5)Game Issues of Potion of Speed, Speed, and Teleporters

6)Game Issues of Generators

7)Game Issues of Experience Points & Experience Levels

8)Game Issues of Basic Intelligence for characters

I am working on putting together a Scenario Trivia contest to test 
knowledge of all scenarios on the website, but I haven't decided the 
prize(s) yet.
